DOC.brief_summary: The main objective randomize trial compare 6 FEC100 4 FEC100 + 4 Taxol patient resect node positive breast cancer . Main endpoint disease free survival . Secondary endpoint overall survival , time local recurrence , time distant metastasis , tolerance . A total 840 patient include trial .
